n = int(input())
p = list(map(int, input().split()))

cnt = 0

for i in range(1,n-1):
    sorted_list = sorted([p[i-1], p[i], p[i+1]])
    if p[i] == sorted_list[1]:
        cnt += 1

print(cnt)

n = int(input())
p = list(map(int, input().split()))
count = 0

for i in range(1, n-1):
    if (p[i-1] < p[i] and p[i] < p[i+1]) or (p[i-1] > p[i] and p[i] > p[i+1]):
        count += 1

print(count)

import sys

input = sys.stdin.readline

N = int(input())
P = list(map(int, input().split()))

count = 0
for i in range(1, N - 1):
    if P[i - 1] < P[i] < P[i + 1]:
        count += 1
    elif P[i - 1] > P[i] > P[i + 1]:
        count += 1

print(count)
